game.miscDetails: The buttons are mirrored on both sides of the joystick. There are three settings for the type of control panel: 'Type A Upright' (1 joystick, alternating), 'Type B Cocktail--no flip' (2 joysticks, alternating), and 'Type C Cocktail--flip' (2 joysticks, alternating). Those with normal 2 joystick upright cabs will be happy with the Type B setting.
